segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children on the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A small boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open upper cabinet, aiming for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, that jar is labeled "COOKIE JAR" â€“ how classic!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in his other hand, presumably to load up with treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly a co-conspirator in this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear that stool is going to tip over at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls and hits his head on the counter?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me quite anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is entirely unaware of their risky endeavors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a dangerous game they're playing for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
